shortDescription.default: FAQ webpart that saves questions/answers on the host page. FAQs are rearrangeable.

longDescription.default: This webpart makes use of the react Accordion and SortableList components and allows page editors to enter FAQs from the host page itself, saving them as part of the page.

features.title: spfx-wp-slickfaq Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the intermed solution.
